Name: Swap Chain Support Details
Description: Stores information on the capabilities of the physical device that can be used by the swap chain.

Variables.Name: capabilities
Variables.Description: The surface capabilities of the physical device that was checked.

Variables.Name: formats
Variables.Description: List of the surface formats of the physical device that was checked.

Variables.Name: presentModes
Variables.Description: List of the present modes of the physical device that was checked.
